profile:
New Dawn Energy Solutions is  a team of engineers, electricians and entrepreneurs dedicated to integrating quality renewable energy systems using solar panels, inverters, wind turbines, batteries aimed at optimal energy production and delivering long term revenue performance through Micro FIT and Feed in Tariff programs or reducing the energy expenditures through Net metering programs for commercial, institutional and residential customers.

We take holistic approach in evaluating the energy need and recommend the most appropriate energy solutions to suite clients’ needs. Our services include Site Assessment, System design, solar panel installation, Micro Fit solar application, energy audit, Monitoring, Maintenance and Project Management. We have been in business since 2006 and offers proven experience, quality workmanship and professional services to each and every customer that exceed their expectation.

Solar PV, solar pool heater, small wind energy, energy Optimization, Energy Audit

profile:
WHO WE ARE

A solar project is about more than electricity. It’s about financing, regulatory know-how, engineering, construction, long-term asset management and operations. And, importantly, like no other energy technology, it’s about people. At Grasshopper, we’re here to address your specific needs. Our team understands a solar project requires the interconnection of key individuals with the ability to materialize the economic, environmental and social advantages of this elegant technology. We’re committed to providing you with a customized solution and exceptional customer service from start to finish.

OUR HISTORY

Grasshopper is a long-time advocate of green energy, with the conviction it will simply make our world a better place for families to live, work and grow. Since starting up in 2007, we have provided energy solutions to homeowners, farmers, municipalities, school boards and large corporations all the world.
name: Grasshopper Solar

profile:
Xergy Energy provides home and business owners with high performing solar technology for the Ontario FIT, microFIT, and Net Metering programs.   Our Xergy Advantage gives all our customers 5 year standard system maintenance and monitoring, performance guarantees and available extended warranties.

Visit us at www.xergy.ca/homestars to find out more!
